## Appointments

- **Postdoctoral Researcher**, Argonne National Laboratory — 2024 – present  
  ML-enhanced GW/BSE workflows and exascale automation within the NST Division.
- **Graduate Research Assistant**, Wayne State University — 2019 – 2024  
  Quantum dot interfaces, dielectric embedding, and ligand chemistry (Advisor: Prof. Zhen-Fei Liu).

## Education

- **Ph.D., Chemistry**, Wayne State University (2019 – 2024)   
  Physical chemistry focus with specialization in many-body perturbation theory and scientific software development.
- **B.S., Chemistry (Honors)**, Kwame Nkrumah University of Science & Technology (2017)
